New Records: Najibullah Zadran scored 44 runs off 25 balls in the match-winning innings.
Afghanistan won the match by 6 wickets.
Key Match Events: Najibullah Zadran's match-winning knock in the 19.2 overs.
Ryan Burles took three wickets in one over.
Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan won the toss and chose to bat first.
Post-Match Reflections: Najibullah Zadran was named Man of the Match for his performance.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was the first of a three-match series.
